pkgmetadata.longdescription: Comprehensive Science Mapping Analysis // Tool for quantitative research in scientometrics and bibliometrics. It provides various routines for importing bibliographic data from 'SCOPUS', 'Clarivate Analytics Web of Science' (https://www.webofknowledge.com/), 'Digital Science Dimensions' (https://www.dimensions.ai/), 'Cochrane Library' (https://www.cochranelibrary.com/), 'Lens' (https://lens.org), and 'PubMed' (https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/) databases, performing bibliometric analysis and building networks for co- citation, coupling, scientific collaboration and co-word analysis.
